cp_stars.name: Ironclad
cp_stars.tooltip_raw: Reduces damage taken from direct damage attacks.

cp_stars.name: Duelist's Rebuff
cp_stars.tooltip_raw: Reduces damage taken by single target attacks (placeholder).

cp_stars.name: Bulwark
cp_stars.tooltip_raw: Increases armor when wearing a shield or ice staff (placeholder).

cp_stars.name: Resilience
cp_stars.tooltip_raw: Grants Critical Resistance after being critically hit (placeholder).

cp_stars.name: Pain's Refuge
cp_stars.tooltip_raw: Reduces damage taken based on number of negative effects (placeholder).

cp_stars.name: Sustained by Suffering
cp_stars.tooltip_raw: Increases Health, Magicka, and Stamina recovery while under a negative effect (placeholder).

cp_stars.name: Gifted Rider
cp_stars.tooltip_raw: Increases mount speed and reduces mount stamina drain (placeholder).
